Okay, I'm in a bit of a tricky situation. "George" is to the right and below me, and there are two "annoyed" citizens to the right. I also need to preserve the "quiet" citizens, and there are some to the left. I need to pacify the "annoyed" citizens, but avoid getting caught by George. Moving right would get me closer to the annoyed citizens but also to George. Moving left would take me further away, but there are a lot of quiet citizens there which could lead to george converting them if he follows me. The safest immediate action is to move up, to distance myself slightly from George and perhaps get a better angle to pacify the annoyed citizens later.
